summary: The penguins of the Central Park Zoo have an adventure in the city on Christmas Eve.
cast: Tom McGrath|Chris Miller|Christopher Knights|John DiMaggio|Elisa Gabrielli|Bill Fagerbakke|Sean Bishop|Mitch Carter|Rif Hutton|Richard Miro|Holly Dorff|Hope Levy|Lynnanne Zager|Jeffrey Katzenberg|Conrad Vernon
title: Los pingüinos de Madagascar en travesura navideña
